shout.body:
5 UK Number 1 Albums, 18 Top 10 Singles...But NO Number 1 hits! Lets try changing that!
Here's what we do: Between the 23rd and 28th of June just go to a UK based LEGAL music download website (i know its obvious) and download either Keep The Faith, Wanted Dead or Alive or It's My Life. If we get enough people to do this we should be able to storm the charts and people at Radio 1 will wonder what the hell is happening!
I know Livin' On A Prayer isnt on the list but i thought it was too obvious. Download them all if you like and lets see what happens! I heard that it takes about 14,000 sales to get top 5 these days so if we tell as many fans as possible this should be a breeze!
As this event hasn't started yet please suggest different songs to download, i just wanted to give an idea and cover a few bases really!
if your a hardcore fan and are interested please join:
The Facebook group http://www.facebook.com/event.php...
or
The Bebo Group http://www.bebo.com/bonjovi-uk1
